# Certifications

## Functional Techniques - Certified

During my internship with Stretch Affect, I was inspired by their clinicians, specifically Ralph Dartt, DPT to take continued education through the Gray Institute.

During my *Functional Techniques* certificate course, my biggest takeaways from this course was the importance of looking at different aspects of training to optimize functionality, such as integration of as many relevant joints, facilitating proprioceptors, and including alternation between force production and absorption
